attributes.action: give all over 70 year of age  attendence alowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the over 65's in this country who apply for attendence alowance or some other kind of beniffit always seem to  get the answer NO!
my mother is one of them she applyed 3 times now and still gets the answer no.
 she's 71 i call on the goverment to wake up and lets suport our mums and dads in there last years lets help them sign up and show your suport
